title: TIL: "Champion Revealed: Barn, The Sentient Barn" had 511 pages of posts
body:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2425713&page=1

wow. if I was motivated, I'd dig through and find where I posted in it....

anyone else able to locate some old GD gems? I'm in a nostalgic mood.

edit: first current GDer to appear ITT: A Swarm of Koala, much respect man (pg 11)
